TopicTitle: Wanting to make an animation in maya...

Articles.Content:
Ok. I make animations in Autodesk Maya 2013. I am a hopeless rig maker so is it possible to import the KSP game models for the Kerbal Space Center and all the part models into Autodesk Maya 2013? If it is then I will make an animation to promote KSP via vairous sites I use. And Ill prove I can animate!

-PCGeek

As far as I know, there is no official way to get a hold of in game assets. Some people use programs like NinjaRipper to get a hold of assets in RAM, but there is nothing official that I know of. If there is, let me know!
ok. ill just reattempt to create them in maya... if i can.....
